## Feature Summary

Provide a short, clear summary of the feature you are requesting.

---

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve?

Describe the current limitation or pain point.

---

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you think this feature should work.

Include:

- UI behavior (if applicable)
- API changes (if applicable)
- Database impact (if applicable)
- RBAC considerations (if applicable)

---

## Tenant & Permission Impact

Does this feature:

- [ ] Affect tenant isolation?
- [ ] Require new roles or permissions?
- [ ] Modify inventory ledger logic?
- [ ] Impact authentication or security?

Explain if yes.

---

## Example Use Case

Describe a real-world example of how this feature would be used.

---

## Alternative Solutions Considered

List any alternative approaches you considered.

---

## Additional Context

Add any screenshots, diagrams, or references that help explain the feature.

---

## Implementation Checklist (Optional)

- [ ] Backend changes required
- [ ] Frontend changes required
- [ ] Database schema updates required
- [ ] Tests required
- [ ] Documentation updates required
